sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form'
import { Container, Row, Column } from './styles'
import { maskMoney } from '../../components/MaksMoney'

interface IFormInput {
  salarioMensal: number
  percentualAporte: number
  aporteMensal: number
  rendaNecessaria: number
}

const FormCalc: React.FC = () => {
  const { control, handleSubmit, register, setValue, errors } = useForm<
    IFormInput
  >()

  const onSubmit = (data: IFormInput) => {
    console.log(data)
  }

  function onChangeRemunaration(e) {
    setValue('salarioMensal', maskMoney(e.target.value))
  }

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
      <Container>
        <Row>
          <Column>
            <label>Salário Mensal</label>
            <input
              placeholder="R$ 0,00"
              className={errors.salarioMensal ? 'money inpt-error' : 'money'}
              type="text"
              name="salarioMensal"
              onChange={onChangeRemunaration}
              ref={register({ required: true })}
            />
          </Column>
          <Column>
            <label>Percentual de Aporte</label>
            <input
              className={errors.percentualAporte && 'inpt-error'}
              type="text"
              name="percentualAporte"
              onChange={onChangeRemunaration}
              ref={register({ required: true, maxLength: 3 })}
            />
          </Column>
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Column>
            <label>Aporte Mensal</label>
            <input
              className={errors.aporteMensal && 'inpt-error'}
              type="text"
              name="aporteMensal"
              onChange={onChangeRemunaration}
              ref={register()}
            />
          </Column>
          <Column>
            <label>Renda Necessária</label>
            <input
              className={errors.rendaNecessaria && 'inpt-error'}
              type="text"
              name="rendaNecessaria"
              onChange={onChangeRemunaration}
              ref={register()}
            />
          </Column>
        </Row>
        <input type="submit" value="Calcular" />
      </Container>
    </form>
  )
}

export default FormCalc
